trans-unit.source: You should contact gallery administrators when:
trans-unit.target: You should contact gallery administrators when:

trans-unit.source: You need to delete an item that you published.
trans-unit.target: You need to delete an item that you published.

trans-unit.source: You need help with your account.
trans-unit.target: You need help with your account.

trans-unit.source: You want to report an issue in the items in the gallery.
trans-unit.target: You want to report an issue in the items in the gallery.

trans-unit.source: You have item name dispute with other users and you are not able to resolve it by contacting the users.
trans-unit.target: You have item name dispute with other users and you are not able to resolve it by contacting the users.

trans-unit.source: You were contacted by Gallery Administrators, regarding your items in the gallery and you want to respond.
trans-unit.target: You were contacted by Gallery Administrators, regarding your items in the gallery and you want to respond.

trans-unit.source: If you are reporting abuse of an item, you can find Report Abuse link below the item information on the left panel.
trans-unit.target: If you are reporting abuse of an item, you can find Report Abuse link below the item information on the left panel.

trans-unit.source: For any other general questions regarding the Gallery, please submit your question to [UserVoice](http://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell)
trans-unit.target: For any other general questions regarding the Gallery, please submit your question to [UserVoice](http://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell)
